abstract.para: Troubleshooting scenarios with resolutions for the VSA service.This page describes troubleshooting scenarios for VSA.

sidebar.title: Issue: You are unable to access the CMC utility after rebooting one of your controller nodes
sidebar.para: If you have rebooted one of your controller nodes and are no longer able to access the CMC utility, you can use these steps to regain access:

listitem.para: Log in to your controller node.
Verify the port that the CMC utility is using:
listitem.screen: $ netstat -anp | grep vnc (Not all processes could be identified, non-owned process info will not be shown, you would have to be root to see it all.) tcp 0 0 0.0.0.0:6003 0.0.0.0:* LISTEN 1413/Xvnc4 tcp6 0 0 :::5903 :::* LISTEN 1413/Xvnc4
